hQuery.php
  • examples
playground.php
1 <?php
2  // Read $url and $sel from request ($_POST | $_GET)
3  $url = @$_POST['url'] ?: @$_GET['url'];
4  $sel = @$_POST['sel'] ?: @$_GET['sel'];
5  $go = @$_POST['go'] ?: @$_GET['go'];
6  $rm = strtoupper(getenv('REQUEST_METHOD') ?: $_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD']);
7 // var_export(compact('url', 'sel', 'go')+[$rm]+$_SERVER);
8  if ( $rm == 'POST' ) {
9  require_once __DIR__ . '/../hquery.php';
10 
11  $config = [
12  'user_agent' => 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/59.0.3071.115 Safari/537.36',
13  'accept_html' => 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8',
14  ];
15 
16  // Enable cache
17  hQuery::$cache_path = sys_get_temp_dir() . '/hQuery/';
18 
19  // Results acumulator
20  $return = array();
21 
22  // If we have $url to parse and $sel (selector) to fetch, we a good to go
23  if($url && $sel) {
24  try {
25  $doc = hQuery::fromUrl(
26  $url
27  , [
28  'Accept' => $config['accept_html'],
29  'User-Agent' => $config['user_agent'],
30  ]
31  );
32  if($doc) {
33  // Read some meta info from $doc
34  $t = $doc->find('head title') and $t = trim($t->text()) and $meta['title'] = $t;
35  $t = $doc->find('head meta');
36  if ( $t ) foreach($t as $k => $v) {
37  switch($v->attr('name')) {
38  case 'description': {
39  $t = trim($v->attr('content')) and $meta['description'] = $t;
40  } break;
41  case 'keywords': {
42  $t = trim($v->attr('content')) and $meta['keywords'] = $t;
43  } break;
44  }
45  }
46  if ( $t = $doc->headers ) {
47  $b = array();
48  foreach($t as $k => $v) $b[$k] = "$k: " . (is_array($v) ? implode(PHP_EOL, $v) : $v);
49  $meta['headers'] = $b = implode(PHP_EOL, $b);
50  }
51  $select_time = microtime(true);
52  $elements = $doc->find($sel);
53  $select_time = microtime(true) - $select_time;
54  $return['select_time'] = $select_time;
55  $return['elements_count'] = count($elements);
56  }
57  else {
58  $return['request'] = hQuery::$last_http_result;
59  }
60  }
61  catch(Exception $ex) {
62  $error = $ex;
63  }
64  }
65  }
66 ?>
67 <!DOCTYPE html>
68 <html>
69 <head>
70  <meta charset="utf8" />
71  <title>hQuery playground example</title>
72  <style lang="css">
73  * {
74  box-sizing: border-box;
75  }
76  html, body {
77  position: relative;
78  min-height: 100%;
79  }
80  header, section {
81  margin: 10px auto;
82  padding: 10px;
83  width: 90%;
84  max-width: 1200px;
85  border: 1px solid #eaeaea;
86  }
87 
88  input {
89  width: 100%;
90  }
91  </style>
92 </head>
93 <body>
94  <header class="selector">
95  <form name="hquery" action="" method="post">
96  <p><label>URL: <input type="url" name="url" value="<?=htmlspecialchars(@$url, ENT_QUOTES);?>" placeholder="ex. https://mariauzun.com" autofocus class="form-control" /></label></p>
97  <p><label>Selector: <input type="text" name="sel" value="<?=htmlspecialchars(@$sel, ENT_QUOTES);?>" placeholder="ex. 'a &gt; img:parent'" class="form-control" /></label></p>
98 
99  <p>
100  <button type="submit" name="go" value="elements" class="btn btn-success">Fetch elements</button>
101  <button type="submit" name="go" value="meta" class="btn btn-success">Fetch meta</button>
102  <button type="submit" name="go" value="source" class="btn btn-success">Fetch source</button>
103  </p>
104 
105  <?php if( !empty($error) ): ?>
106  <div class="error">
107  <h3>Error:</h3>
108  <p>
109  <?=$error->getMessage();?>
110  </p>
111  </div>
112  <?php endif; ?>
113  </form>
114  </header>
115 
116  <section class="result">
117  <?php switch ($go) {
118  case 'elements': if(!empty($elements)):?>
119  <hr />
120  <table style="width: 100%">
121  <thead><tr>
122  <th>pos.</th>
123  <th>html</th>
124  <th>view</th>
125  </tr></thead>
126  <tbody>
127  <?php foreach($elements as $pos => $el): ?>
128  <tr>
129  <td><i class="col-xs-1"><?=$pos;?></i></td>
130  <td><code style="word-break:break-word;"><?=htmlspecialchars($el->outerHtml(), ENT_QUOTES);?></code>&nbsp;</td>
131  <td><?=$el->outerHtml();?></td>
132  </tr>
133  <?php endforeach;?>
134  </tbody>
135  </table>
136  <?php
137  endif;
138  break;
139 
140  case 'meta':?>
141  <ul class="list-group">
142  <li class="list-group-item">
143  hQuery::$cache_path: <?php echo hQuery::$cache_path ?>
144  </li>
145  <li class="list-group-item">
146  Size: <span data-name="doc.size" class="badge"><?=empty($doc)?'':$doc->size;?></span>
147  <br />
148  </li>
149  <li class="list-group-item">Read Time: <span class="badge"><span data-name="doc.read_time"><?php echo $doc->read_time?></span> ms</span><br /></li>
150  <li class="list-group-item">Index Time: <span class="badge"><span data-name="doc.index_time"><?php echo $doc->index_time?></span> ms</span><br /></li>
151  <li class="list-group-item">
152  Charset: <span data-name="doc.charset" class="badge"><?=empty($doc)?'':$doc->charset;?></span>
153  <br />
154  </li>
155  <li class="list-group-item">
156  Base URL: <span data-name="doc.base_url" class="badge"><?=empty($doc)?'':$doc->base_url;?></span>
157  <br />
158  </li>
159  <li class="list-group-item">
160  Href: <span data-name="doc.href" class="badge"><?=empty($doc)?'':$doc->href;?></span>
161  <br />
162  </li>
163  <li class="list-group-item">
164  Title: <span data-name="doc.title" class="badge"><?=empty($meta['title'])?'':$meta['title'];?></span>
165  <br />
166  </li>
167  <li class="list-group-item">
168  Description: <span data-name="doc.description" class="badge"><?=empty($meta['description'])?'':$meta['description'];?></span>
169  <br />
170  </li>
171  <li class="list-group-item">
172  Keywords: <span data-name="doc.keywords" class="badge"><?=empty($meta['keywords'])?'':$meta['keywords'];?></span>
173  <br />
174  </li>
175  <li class="list-group-item">
176  HTTP Headers: <pre data-name="doc.headers"><?=empty($meta['headers'])?'':$meta['headers'];?></pre>
177  </li>
178  </ul>
179  <?php
180  break;
181 
182  case 'source':?>
183  <pre><?=empty($doc)?'':htmlspecialchars($doc->html(), ENT_QUOTES);?></pre>
184  <?php
185  break;
186  } ?>
187  </section>
188 </body>
189 </html>
